question: Which phrase embodied the vision for the Dominion of Canada?
possible_answers: A. "The land of the strong and free"
B. "Dominion from sea to sea and from the river to the ends of the earth"
D. "O Canada, my home and native land"
main_question: Which phrase embodied the vision for the Dominion of Canada?
answer: B. "Dominion from sea to sea and from the river to the ends of the earth"
explanatory_sentence: This phrase embodied the vision of building a powerful, united, wealthy and free country that spanned a continent.
